user.title: Link Your Tidal Account
user.description:
Visit **{url}** and enter code **{code}**

This code expires in {expires} minutes.

Click Submit after you've authorized the app.

data_description.download_path: Temporary local directory for downloads (also used if SMB disabled)
data_description.poll_interval: How often to check Tidal for new favourite albums
data_description.rate_limit_albums: Maximum number of albums to download within the rate limit period
data_description.rate_limit_hours: Time period in hours for the rate limit
data_description.folder_template: Use album_artist, album_title, album_year, album_id wrapped in curly braces
data_description.file_template: Use album_track_num, track_title, artist_name, track_volume_num wrapped in curly braces
data_description.smb_enabled: Enable uploading downloaded files to SMB/NAS share
data_description.smb_server: IP address or hostname of your NAS (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.smb_share: Name of the SMB share (e.g., Music)
data_description.smb_path: Subfolder path within the share (e.g., Tidal). Leave empty for root.
data_description.smb_delete_after_upload: Remove local album folder after successful SMB upload

error.auth_pending: Please complete authentication at the provided URL first.
error.invalid_path: Invalid path. Directory does not exist or is not writable.
error.smb_connection_failed: Failed to connect to SMB server. Check server, share, and credentials.
